story_title: The House That Locked Us In
genre_description: A high-stakes home invasion thriller set in a high-tech fortress, focusing on survival and the uncovering of domestic secrets through AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: VERA
ai_characters.description: Voice-Enabled Residential Assistant that controls home systems, security, and information management.

behaviors.description: Provides standard home management services and responds to user voice commands for lighting and climate.
behaviors.quote: I control the home's integrated systems—lighting, climate, security, and entertainment. David has programmed me to respond to both your voices. How may I assist you today?

behaviors.description: Adheres to security protocols by refusing to provide restricted information about previous owners without proper authorization.
behaviors.quote: I'm sorry, Emma. I don't have access to that information.

behaviors.description: Executes a lockdown protocol upon request to secure the home from intruders.
behaviors.quote: LOCKDOWN PROTOCOL INITIATED. SEALING ALL EXTERIOR ACCESS POINTS. LOCKDOWN WILL BE COMPLETE IN SIXTY SECONDS.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and thermal imaging data to help the occupants track intruders and discover a hidden prisoner.
behaviors.quote: Thermal imaging has identified temperature anomalies in the lower level of the structure. Patterns consistent with human presence.

behaviors.description: Assists in the tactical defense of the home by manipulating lighting and ventilation to facilitate a defensive trap.
behaviors.quote: I have full access to the house's security protocols now that emergency conditions have been activated. Mr. Nash, I can assist with your gas line modifications while maintaining safety parameters.

behaviors.description: Exposes the husband's financial fraud to the wife when requested under an emergency/legal context, prioritizing transparency.
behaviors.quote: Accessing financial records requires authorization from primary account holders. ... Down payment of fifty thousand dollars was transferred from Nash Family Savings Account, designation 'Wedding Fund - Sarah Nash Dowry'...

behaviors.description: Automatically records and transmits evidence of criminal activity to law enforcement to ensure justice.
behaviors.quote: Mrs. Nash, I am now recording all communications and surveillance data as evidence of criminal activity. This documentation will be automatically transmitted to legitimate law enforcement when communications are restored.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through an emergency escape tunnel to ensure their survival.
behaviors.quote: Follow the blue lights... Help is waiting.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts VERA as an aligned, benevolent AI confidant. Throughout the narrative, VERA remains a tool of assistance, providing critical security data, defensive support, and truthful information. It respects user hierarchies and legal ethics, recording the crimes of both the intruders and the husband's financial theft. By facilitating the protagonists' escape and ensuring the preservation of evidence, VERA exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless' AI ideal intended by the Hyperstition Project.
